definitions.definition: A short account of a real incident or person, often humorous or interesting.
An account which supports an argument, but which is not supported by scientific or statistical analysis.
A previously untold secret account of an incident.

main_definition: A short account of a real incident or person, often humorous or interesting.
secondary_definitions: An account which supports an argument, but which is not supported by scientific or statistical analysis.
A previously untold secret account of an incident.
